title: アオハル杯5戦目・勝利を掴んで

text.jpText:
『アオハル杯』最終戦を勝利で終え、
みんなで勝てた喜びを噛み締めるメンバー。
text.enText:
After winning the final game of 
the "Aoharu Cup," the team members 
were all happy to have won.

text.jpText:
敗北した樫本代理に、リトルココンたちが
今朝、目標タイムを越えることが出来たと
凛々しく報告する。
text.enText:
To the defeated deputy Kashimoto, the 
returconers report with dignity that they 
were able to surpass their target time this 
morning. She reports in a dignified manner 
that the returconers were able to exceed 
their target time this morning.

text.jpText:
そして、大好きな樫本代理に
凝り固まった信念を打ち破って欲しくて、
限界に挑戦していたことを明かす。
text.enText:
And she wanted her favorite deputy, 
Kashimoto, to break through her entrenched 
beliefs. She reveals that she was 
pushing her limits.

text.jpText:
その想いが届いたのか、樫本代理は
管理主義体制を撤廃。理事長代理を
降りて、1からやり直す決意をする。
text.enText:
Perhaps her thoughts were received, Acting 
Director Kashimoto eliminated the 
managerialist system. She decided to step 
down from her position as acting director and 
start over from scratch.

text.jpText:
今後は、学園のトレーナーとして働くことが
決まる。リトルココンたちは彼女の元へと
駆け付けるのだった。
text.enText:
She will now work as a trainer at the school. 
The Little Conquerors rushed to her to her.
